song_name: Dream A Little Dream Of Me
metrics_conclusion: Dream A Little Dream Of Me has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Dream A Little Dream Of Me is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
